items: 4 cups assorted fresh fruit (such as berries, pitted cherries, and pitted sliced apricots and peaches)
1 cup raw cashews (soaked in cold water for at least 4 hours)
1 cup dried chickpeas (3 cups cooked or 2 14 oz cans)
2 tablespoons olive oil + extra for serving
1 1/2 teaspoons sea salt, or to taste
